inclusion.criterion: Verified or suspected primary CNS lymphoma
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patient must consent to genetic and metabolomic analysis of their cancer
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Treatment of the relapse not initiated (except pretreatment with corticosteroids)
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: Being able to undergo standard assessment ( eg, Fluorine-18 fluorodeoxyglucose positron emission tomography (18F-FDG-PET), MRI of the neuroaxis and bone marrow biopsy)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Tumor biopsy and/or bone-marrow biopsy used for diagnosis available
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Evidence of a CNS mass creating mass-effect or midline shift such that lumbar puncture is contraindicated
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Other contraindications to lumbar puncture according to local guidelines
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Other previous or current hematological malignancy
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has a history of PCOS, Obesity, HTN and was diagnosed with Burkitt's lymphoma. They underwent pericardiocentesis and lumbar puncture/bone marrow biopsy which were negative for involvement.
